data.text:
Board certified paediatrician in public health:

https://t.co/cXLBdUxX6B
@mparlion @DeeGilhawley Canada the same and masks have been required for kids aged 2 and up indoors
@DeeGilhawley @IrishTimes I'm so sick of pandemic by paid opinion. rather than the facts, the truth. It's the little things ..

@DeeGilhawley @IrishTimes Events this past week transported me back to 2020 and the dread  building re an unknown novel virus heading our way.Who foresaw that The Irish Times view in 2022 would be that the worst thing to befall Irish children would be  VOLUNTARY maskwearing for 9+yrs from Dec-Feb 22🙄

@DeeGilhawley Of course there isn't. Paul knows this. That article today was shambolic but not surprising. His smarmy, condescending tone at the NPHET pressers was embarrassing where he spent his time trying to catch NPHET out.

@DeeGilhawley @IrishTimes Not "may" "have caused"? Written by a health journalist,I'd assume there's established+accepted evidence of ill effects🤔 Still haven't seen those studies. Many students+staff will continue to wear masks as there IS evidence to say pandemics don't end just because Govt says so😷
